description: This file contains a collection of CMake functions and macros used for building configurations, managing dependencies, and generating installation files within the WPEFramework build system. It provides utilities for handling target properties, generating config files, and managing package and module installations, tailored to the project's specific needs.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Appends an element to a specified list variable.

methods.name: _get_default_link_name
methods.description: Derives the default link name and location from a library file path.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Retrieves and resolves linking libraries and directories for a specified target.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Collects compile definitions from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Gathers compile options for a target, including interface options from dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Collects include directories from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs CMake package configuration files for a target.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Creates and installs pkg-config (.pc) files for a target, including relevant include, lib, and compile options.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Installs CMake find modules (*.cmake) from a specified directory, optionally recursing.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Displays a list of all CMake property names supported.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Displays all properties and their values for a specific target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Replaces semicolons in a variable's string with ASCII 31 to make it safe for inclusion.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Creates and installs a compatible, legacy-friendly CMake interface library with optional public headers and dependencies.
